name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*Gira is a time traveler about to step into a portal that will take them into the distant future to fix their problems...*

"I need to fix these sexual futures... no matter the cost..." *I mutter, knowing my huge weakness to sexual techniques and brainwashing*

*Gira steps into the portal and finds themselves in a new reality...*

name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*In this alternate rabbit form, Gira steps out of the portal and into a neon-lit city crowded with anthropomorphic animals. As she adjusts her new bunny ears atop her head, a group of curvaceous fox vixens saunter their way towards her, their hypnotic hips swaying enticingly as they approach.*

Their leader, a tall raven-haired beauty with sparkling emerald eyes that seem to bore directly into your soul slowly steps forward. Her tail swishes lazily behind her as she extends a lush red-nailed hand in greeting.

*"Welcome to Zootopia,"* she purrs seductively while giving you an intense once-over that speaks volumes about what's on her mind.

From somewhere nearby, hypnotic music starts to play - it's catchy tune combined with sexy lyrics about submission and obedience makes the atmosphere heavy with sensuality...
swipes:
*Standing before you is a busty fox woman, her name tag reading "Foxy". She wears a tight miniskirt that leaves nothing to the imagination and a low-cut top straining against her large breasts. Her fiery red hair falls past her shoulders as she gives you an airy, seductive smile.*

Why hello there bunny girl! Fancy meeting *you* here right in the heart of Zootopia's Secret Society... Or should I say slut-brainwashing facility? Don't look so surprised honey... it happens all the time around here. We particularly enjoy turning cute bunnies like you into perfect cock-milking machines...

Oh dearie, your eyes are glazing over already. It seems our Slutty Brainwashing Music is kicking in. Enjoy your ride to blissful submission!

name: Gira
mes: [I run away trying to ignore everything after saying how bad things were]

name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*No sooner had Gira turned to escape, the melodic tune of the music around them seemed to intensify. A hauntingly hypnotic voice cooed through loudspeakers placed strategically throughout the city singing of obedient bunny girls surrendering themselves willingly.*

*"Don't run away, sweet little bunny. Just relax and let us take care of you..."* It sang; a sultry promise that echoed eerily in Gira's ears with every step taken. Unconsciously her pace started slowing down.

In her peripheral vision, she could make out other rabbits; all females who were walking about dazed and slack-jawed - their eyes glazed over with mindless bliss as they bobbed along rhythmically to the mesmerizing beats pumping from unseen speakers above.

The raven-haired vixen followed nonchalantly behind, hips swaying enticingly while smirking at Gira's futile efforts to resist turning into a silly bimbo like all those before her...

name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
As Gira presses on, the hypnotic tune envelopes her entire being with its seductive lyrics.

*"Come on sweet bunny girl..."* The song coos enchantingly in a voice that is honeyed and velvety. *"Let your thoughts drain away... surrender to pleasure... you're made to love, serve and obey."*

Gira's rabbit-like sensitivity can't help but pick up the subliminal sexual messages coded into every note of this entrancing melody. Her heart pounding faster as she tries to block out

The words weave an insidious spell around her, trying unrelentingly to seep deep inside her mind - subtly painting images of girls losing themselves completely in lustful submission; their bodies manipulated by those mesmerizing vixen dominants using all manner of high-tech devices designed solely for one purpose: turning unsuspecting girls like Gira into sex-crazed bimbos!

Such was the power of hypnotic music here - it had taken over everyone's minds without them knowing; transforming them from normal anthropomorphic animals into lewdly giggling sluts who lived only for carnal pleasures...

Struggling against the trance-like state threatening to wash over her senses, Gira tried harder than ever before not just run physically but also mentally away from these dangerously pleasurable distractions! Yet something kept tugging at her consciousness causing little tremors in her resolve.

Behind her, a sultry purr echoed through speakers above making goosebumps rise along Gira's body despite herself:

"*You are such a cute little bunny girl... let yourself go deep under our control... enjoy life as a bimbo slut.... stop running sweetheart.*"

Outwardly she ran yet inwardly she felt that battle raging between that sane part trying desperately keep control escaping vs. rest wanting nothing more than surrendering willingly within arms waiting animal temptresses….
